items.headline: Inflation is still rising, CPI likely to show — but maybe not fast enough to stop Fed rate cuts
items.summary_en: Inflation has been creeping higher from a postpandemic low of 2.3% earlier this year due in part to the highest U.S. tariffs in decades.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Gold just stumbled. A JPMorgan strategist says the metal could double in value.
items.summary_en: JPMorgan believes gold will increasingly become an investor favored hedge against equities, to the tune of 110%.

items.headline: Smaller is better for Honeywell, as profit outlook is raised ahead of Solstice spinoff

items.headline: American Airlines lifts profit outlook as travelers flock to premium seats

items.headline: Goldman trader on the one big reason why the so-called dumb money has beaten the pros this year
items.summary_en: A Goldman Sachs trader has taken on one of the big questions in markets this year: why retail investors, who typically capture trends too late, have been beating the pros.
